member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.FileSystems.EmbeddedResourceFileSystem
member.summary: Looks up files using embedded resources in the specified assembly. This file system is case sensitive.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.FileSystems.EmbeddedResourceFileSystem.#ctor(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified assembly and empty base namespace.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.FileSystems.EmbeddedResourceFileSystem.#ctor(System.Reflection.Assembly,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified assembly and base namespace.
member.param: The assembly that contains the embedded resources.
The base namespace that contains the embedded resources.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.FileSystems.EmbeddedResourceFileSystem.TryGetFileInfo(System.String,Microsoft.AspNet.FileSystems.IFileInfo@)
member.summary: Locate a file at the given path
member.param: The path that identifies the file
member.returns: True if a file was located at the given path

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.FileSystems.EmbeddedResourceFileSystem.TryGetDirectoryContents(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.AspNet.FileSystems.IFileInfo}@)
member.summary: Enumerate a directory at the given path, if any. This file system uses a flat directory structure. Everything under the base namespace is considered to be one directory.
member.param: The path that identifies the directory
member.returns: True if a directory was located at the given path

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.FileSystems.IFileInfo
member.summary: Represents a file in the given file system.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.FileSystems.IFileInfo.Length
member.summary: The length of the file in bytes, or -1 for a directory info

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.FileSystems.IFileInfo.PhysicalPath
member.summary: The path to the file, including the file name. Return null if the file is not directly accessible.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.FileSystems.IFileInfo.Name
member.summary: The name of the file

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.FileSystems.IFileInfo.LastModified
member.summary: When the file was last modified

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.FileSystems.IFileInfo.IsDirectory
member.summary: True for the case TryGetDirectoryContents has enumerated a sub-directory

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.FileSystems.IFileInfo.CreateReadStream
member.summary: Return file contents as readonly stream. Caller should dispose stream when complete.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.FileSystems.IFileSystem
member.summary: A file system abstraction

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.FileSystems.IFileSystem.TryGetFileInfo(System.String,Microsoft.AspNet.FileSystems.IFileInfo@)
member.summary: Locate a file at the given path
member.param: The path that identifies the file
member.returns: True if a file was located at the given path

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.FileSystems.IFileSystem.TryGetDirectoryContents(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.AspNet.FileSystems.IFileInfo}@)
member.summary: Enumerate a directory at the given path, if any
member.param: The path that identifies the directory
member.returns: True if a directory was located at the given path

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.FileSystems.IFileSystem.TryGetParentPath(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Gets the parent directory for the specified .
member.param: A path under the application root that identifies either a file or a directory.
The path to the parent directory.
member.returns: True if the parent directory is rooted inside this instance of , false otherwise.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.FileSystems.PhysicalFileSystem
member.summary: Looks up files using the on-disk file system

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.FileSystems.PhysicalFileSystem.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of a PhysicalFileSystem at the given root directory.
member.param: The root directory. This should be an absolute path.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.FileSystems.PhysicalFileSystem.Root
member.summary: The root directory for this instance.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.FileSystems.PhysicalFileSystem.TryGetFileInfo(System.String,Microsoft.AspNet.FileSystems.IFileInfo@)
member.summary: Locate a file at the given path by directly mapping path segments to physical directories.
member.param: A path under the root directory
member.returns: True if a file was discovered at the given path

member.summary: Enumerate a directory at the given path, if any.
member.param: A path under the root directory
member.returns: True if a directory was discovered at the given path
